title: How to Make Mango and Brandy Chutney

text: Heat the oil in the saucepan over medium heat. Add the mustard seeds and cook until they pop. Once they begin popping, add the onion and ginger. Stir while cooking for the next 5 minutes. Pour in the brandy and mix through. Cook for a minute. Add the mango, sugar and vinegar. Simmer for 1 1/2 hours or until the chutney begins to thicken. Cook until the texture is thickened sufficiently. Pour the hot chutney into sterilised jars. Seal. Turn the jars over for 2 minutes and then put to one side to cool. Store. Refrigerate once opened.
